description: Bring back this retro dish for your next weeknight dinner. This easy curried sausages recipe is a comforting classic the family will love.
keywords: Curried sausage,Quick & easy dinner,Sausage,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Dairy free,Potato
name: Curried Sausages Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Spray pan with canola oil and heat, add sausages and cook until brown. Set aside and slice.
Cook onion until soft, then return sausages to the pan.
Add Curried Sausages recipe base and milk, stir through.
Simmer uncovered for 5 minutes or until sauce is heated through.
Serve with 1kg long grain rice (cooked as per instructions on pack).
